verses.arabic: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.translation: By the (Winds) that scatter broadcast;

verses.arabic: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا
verses.translation: And those that lift and bear away heavy weights;

verses.arabic: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: And those that flow with ease and gentleness;

verses.arabic: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And those that distribute and apportion by Command;-

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.translation: Verily that which ye are promised is true;

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.translation: And verily Judgment and Justice must indeed come to pass.

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ
verses.translation: By the Sky with (its) numerous Paths,

verses.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.translation: Truly ye are in a doctrine discordant,

verses.arabic: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: Through which are deluded (away from the Truth) such as would be deluded.

verses.arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ
verses.translation: Woe to the falsehood-mongers,-

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Those who (flounder) heedless in a flood of confusion:

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They ask, "When will be the Day of Judgment and Justice?"

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: (It will be) a Day when they will be tried (and tested) over the Fire!

verses.arabic: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: "Taste ye your trial! This is what ye used to ask to be hastened!"
verses.transliteration: Thooqoo fitnatakum hatha allatheekuntum bihi tastaAAjiloon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: As to the Righteous, they will be in the midst of Gardens and Springs,

verses.arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Taking joy in the things which their Lord gives them, because, before then, they lived a good life.
verses.transliteration: Akhitheena ma atahumrabbuhum innahum kanoo qabla thalika muhsineen

verses.arabic: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They were in the habit of sleeping but little by night,

verses.arabic: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in the hour of early dawn, they (were found) praying for Forgiveness;

verses.arabic: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: And in their wealth and possessions (was remembered) the right of the (needy,) him who asked, and him who (for some reason) was prevented (from asking).

verses.arabic: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: On the earth are signs for those of assured Faith,

verses.arabic: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: As also in your own selves: Will ye not then see?

verses.arabic: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in heaven is your Sustenance, as (also) that which ye are promised.

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: Then, by the Lord of heaven and earth, this is the very Truth, as much as the fact that ye can speak intelligently to each other.
verses.transliteration: Fawarabbi assama-i wal-ardiinnahu lahaqqun mithla ma annakum tantiqoon

verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Has the story reached thee, of the honoured guests of Abraham?

verses.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: Behold, they entered his presence, and said: "Peace!" He said, "Peace!" (and thought, "These seem) unusual people."
verses.transliteration: Ith dakhaloo AAalayhi faqaloosalaman qala salamun qawmun munkaroon

verses.arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Then he turned quickly to his household, brought out a fatted calf,

verses.arabic: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And placed it before them.. he said, "Will ye not eat?"

verses.arabic: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: (When they did not eat), He conceived a fear of them. They said, "Fear not," and they gave him glad tidings of a son endowed with knowledge.
verses.transliteration: Faawjasa minhum kheefatan qaloo latakhaf wabashsharoohu bighulamin AAaleem

verses.arabic: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: But his wife came forward (laughing) aloud: she smote her forehead and said: "A barren old woman!"
verses.transliteration: Faaqbalati imraatuhu fee sarratin fasakkatwajhaha waqalat AAajoozun AAaqeem

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: They said, "Even so has thy Lord spoken: and He is full of Wisdom and Knowledge."
verses.transliteration: Qaloo kathaliki qalarabbuki innahu huwa alhakeemu alAAaleem

verses.arabic: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: (Abraham) said: "And what, O ye Messengers, is your errand (now)?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin;-

verses.arabic: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: "To bring on, on them, (a shower of) stones of clay (brimstone),

verses.arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: "Marked as from thy Lord for those who trespass beyond bounds."

verses.arabic: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Then We evacuated those of the Believers who were there,

verses.arabic: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: But We found not there any just (Muslim) persons except in one house:
verses.transliteration: Fama wajadna feehaghayra baytin mina almuslimeen

verses.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: And We left there a Sign for such as fear the Grievous Penalty.
verses.transliteration: Watarakna feeha ayatanlillatheena yakhafoona alAAathaba al-aleem

verses.arabic: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Moses (was another Sign): Behold, We sent him to Pharaoh, with authority manifest.
verses.transliteration: Wafee moosa ith arsanahuila firAAawna bisultanin mubeen

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: But (Pharaoh) turned back with his Chiefs, and said, "A sorcerer, or one possessed!"

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: So We took him and his forces, and threw them into the sea; and his was the blame.
verses.transliteration: Faakhathnahu wajunoodahufanabathnahum fee alyammi wahuwa muleem

verses.arabic: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And in the 'Ad (people) (was another Sign): Behold, We sent against them the devastating Wind:
verses.transliteration: Wafee AAadin ith arsalnaAAalayhimu arreeha alAAaqeem

verses.arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: It left nothing whatever that it came up against, but reduced it to ruin and rottenness.
verses.transliteration: Ma tatharu min shay-in atatAAalayhi illa jaAAalat-hu karrameem

verses.arabic: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And in the Thamud (was another Sign): Behold, they were told, "Enjoy (your brief day) for a little while!"
verses.transliteration: Wafee thamooda ith qeela lahumtamattaAAoo hatta heen

verses.arabic: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: But they insolently defied the Command of their Lord: So the stunning noise (of an earthquake) seized them, even while they were looking on.
verses.transliteration: FaAAataw AAan amri rabbihim faakhathat-humuassaAAiqatu wahum yanthuroon

verses.arabic: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then they could not even stand (on their feet), nor could they help themselves.
verses.transliteration: Fama istataAAoo min qiyaminwama kanoo muntasireen

verses.arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.translation: So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.
verses.transliteration: Waqawma noohin min qablu innahum kanooqawman fasiqeen

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: With power and skill did We construct the Firmament: for it is We Who create the vastness of space.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And We have spread out the (spacious) earth: How excellently We do spread out!

verses.arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And of every thing We have created pairs: That ye may receive instruction.
verses.transliteration: Wamin kulli shay-in khalaqna zawjaynilaAAallakum tathakkaroon

verses.arabic: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Hasten ye then (at once) to Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!
verses.transliteration: Fafirroo ila Allahi inneelakum minhu natheerun mubeen

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And make not another an object of worship with Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!
verses.transliteration: Wala tajAAaloo maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara innee lakum minhu natheerun mubeen

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Similarly, no messenger came to the Peoples before them, but they said (of him) in like manner, "A sorcerer, or one possessed"!
verses.transliteration: Kathalika ma ata allatheenamin qablihim min rasoolin illa qaloo sahirunaw majnoon

verses.arabic: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Is this the legacy they have transmitted, one to another? Nay, they are themselves a people transgressing beyond bounds!
verses.transliteration: Atawasaw bihi bal hum qawmun taghoon

verses.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.translation: So turn away from them: not thine is the blame.

verses.arabic: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: But teach (thy Message) for teaching benefits the Believers.

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: I have only created Jinns and men, that they may serve Me.

verses.arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.translation: No Sustenance do I require of them, nor do I require that they should feed Me.
verses.transliteration: Ma oreedu minhum min rizqin wamaoreedu an yutAAimoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
verses.translation: For Allah is He Who gives (all) Sustenance,- Lord of Power,- Steadfast (for ever).
verses.transliteration: Inna Allaha huwa arrazzaquthoo alquwwati almateen

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.translation: For the Wrong-doers, their portion is like unto the portion of their fellows (of earlier generations): then let them not ask Me to hasten (that portion)!
verses.transliteration: Fa-inna lillatheena thalamoothanooban mithla thanoobi as-habihimfala yastaAAjiloon

verses.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Woe, then, to the Unbelievers, on account of that Day of theirs which they have been promised!
verses.transliteration: Fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo minyawmihimu allathee yooAAadoon
